#Request library
import requests
url = "https://openlibrary.org/search.json?q=harry+potter"
response = requests.get(url)
if response.status_code == 200: data = response.json() print(data["docs"]) else: print("Error:", response.status_code)

<?php
$url = "https://openlibrary.org/search.json?q=harry+potter";
$response = file_get_contents($url);

if ($response !== FALSE) {
    $data = json_decode($response, true);
    print_r($data["docs"]);
} else {
    echo "Error fetching data.";
}
?>
